original_text: The wind goeth toward the south, and turneth about unto the north; it whirleth about continually, and the wind returneth again according to his circuits.
korean_text: 바람은 남으로 불다가 북으로 돌아가며 이리 돌며 저리 돌아 바람은 그 불던 곳으로 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: The wind goeth toward the south
and turneth about unto the north
and the wind returneth again according to his circuits
sentences.korean_translation: 바람이 그 순환에 따라 다시 돌아온다
